text.name: info3
text.text: The IBM Personal Computer, commonly known as the IBM PC,

text.name: info4
text.text: is the original version and progenitor of the IBM PC compatible hardware platform.

text.name: info5
text.text: It is IBM model number 5150, and was introduced on August 12, 1981.

text.name: info6
text.text: It was created by a team of engineers and designers under the direction of

text.name: info7
text.text: Don Estridge of the IBM Entry Systems Division in Boca Raton, Florida.
